content: Se hai una VPN è altamente probabile che il provider della casella email ti blocchi l'accesso.
creator: @next

content: come si può risolvere senza disinstallare la VPN?
creator: kowalczyk.ko

content:
Chiedi al tuo provider email se può sbloccarti l'accesso tramite VPN. Oppure vedi se nelle impostazioni della VPN puoi escludere Thunderbird.

Questi non sono problemi legati a Thunderbird comunque.
creator: @next

content: Since you don't use it, you can reduce the disc space by locating the c:users\<yourid>\appdata\roaming\thunderbird folder, which is where accounts and data are stored. That is probably where the large size is. Just delete it. There is also a small set at c:\users\<yourid>\appdata\local\thunerbird, which can also be deleted. Thunderbird, itself, is either in program files or program files(x32). Just delete it. Your system may have used different drives, but I hope this helps you remove it.
creator: davidsk

content: Please show screenshot of the unzipped profile. What you showed is a subset. You should see a full profile.
